alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 4:56AM PST until December 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 50 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys, San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Diego County Mountains, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated gusts to 60 mph below the San Gorgonio Pass and Cajon Pass in the morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
